alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 28 at 12:39PM PDT until October 29 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 in southern Oregon and as low as 18 in Siskiyou County likely. * WHERE...In California, Western Siskiyou County and Central Siskiyou County. In Oregon, South Central Oregon Coast, Central Douglas County, Eastern Curry County and Josephine County and Jackson County. This includes the Scott, Rogue, Klamath River, Shasta, Umpqua and Illinois valleys. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be the second night of freezing to below freezing temperatures in this area. If widespread freezing to below freezing temperatures do occur in this area, this will be the last freeze warning for the season in this area. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County; South Central Oregon Coast
